none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 03, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 For the finest in UK hardcore influenced MotörPunk in the modern era, please look no further than Los Angeles deadbeats HOT LOAD. Mutants from bands you already love (SMUT, FUNDAMENTAL, RUINED AGE, CEMENTO, HARM and others) joined forces in the new decade and dropped an absolute bomb in Love Bag...high energy, sweat soaked punk rock 'n roll. This is what you want your sex to sound like, assuming it's dangerous sex. HOT LOAD

seo.title: Hot Load - Love Bug demo - Terminal Escape
